timeline.message: Fix test weirdness that was confusing Android Studio

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Common HTTP pipeline used by service clients.
          
          
            
             * Common HTTP pipeline components used by service clients.
timeline.author: vcolin7
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,7 @@
+// Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
+// Licensed under the MIT License.
+
+/**
+ * Common HTTP pipeline used by service clients.

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/core/azure-core/src/main/java/com/azure/android/core/http/package-info.java b/sdk/core/azure-core/src/main/java/com/azure/android/core/http/package-info.java
index d935c763d..663b70817 100644
--- a/sdk/core/azure-core/src/main/java/com/azure/android/core/http/package-info.java
+++ b/sdk/core/azure-core/src/main/java/com/azure/android/core/http/package-info.java

@@ -2,6 +2,6 @@
 // Licensed under the MIT License.
 
 /**
- * Common HTTP pipeline used by service clients.
+ * Common HTTP pipeline components used by service clients.
  */
 package com.azure.android.core.http;

timeline.bodyText:
Should this be capitalized like what we do with Azure Communication Services?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Credential objects used with Azure Blob storage service clients to authorize requests.
          
          
            
             * Credential objects used with Azure Blob Storage Service clients to authorize requests.
timeline.author: vcolin7
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@
+// Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
+// Licensed under the MIT License.
+// Code generated by Microsoft (R) AutoRest Code Generator.
+
+/**
+ * Credential objects used with Azure Blob storage service clients to authorize requests.

replies.bodyText:
Maybe? Even the official docs page mixes the casing: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/storage/blobs/
But I think it makes sense for consistency. I will correct.
replies.author: bsiegel

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/storage/azure-storage-blob/src/main/java/com/azure/android/storage/blob/credential/package-info.java b/sdk/storage/azure-storage-blob/src/main/java/com/azure/android/storage/blob/credential/package-info.java
index ef95e26ba..f7b028984 100644
--- a/sdk/storage/azure-storage-blob/src/main/java/com/azure/android/storage/blob/credential/package-info.java
+++ b/sdk/storage/azure-storage-blob/src/main/java/com/azure/android/storage/blob/credential/package-info.java

@@ -3,6 +3,6 @@
 // Code generated by Microsoft (R) AutoRest Code Generator.
 
 /**
- * Credential objects used with Azure Blob storage service clients to authorize requests.
+ * Credential objects used with Azure Blob Storage service clients to authorize requests.
  */
 package com.azure.android.storage.blob.credential;
